claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Mark Alan Ruffalo  (  -LSB- ˈrʌfəloʊ -RSB- , born November 22 , 1967  )  is an American actor , humanitarian , social activist and film producer .

claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He made his screen debut in an episode of CBS Summer Playhouse  (  1989  )  , followed by minor film roles .

claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He was part of the original cast of This Is Our Youth  (  1996  )  , for which he was nominated for an Independent Spirit Award .

claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Following were his roles in 13 Going on 30  (  2004  )  , Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind  (  2004  )  , Zodiac  (  2007  )  , and What Does n't Kill You  (  2008  )  .

claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: In 2010 , he starred in the psychological thriller Shutter Island and the comedy-drama The Kids Are All Right .

claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: For the latter , he received nominations for the SAG Award , BAFTA Award , and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor .

claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He also co-starred in the mystery films Now You See Me and Now You See Me 2 as FBI Special Agent Dylan Rhodes .

claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: Ruffalo gained international prominence by portraying the Marvel Comics character the Hulk in The Avengers  (  2012  )  and Avengers : Age of Ultron  (  2015  )  .

claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: He starred in and was the co-executive producer of the 2014 television drama film The Normal Heart , for which he was nominated for the Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Television Movie and he won the Screen Actors Guild Award for Best Actor in a TV Movie .

claim: Mark Ruffalo is an American film producer.
premise_source_doc_sentence: The same year , he portrayed Dave Schultz in Foxcatcher , for which he was nominated for awards , including a Golden Globe , and an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor .
